name: OverPong
description:
A retro-style game that turns the breakout genre on its head!

Features:

  • Campaign & Survival modes!
  • 30 exciting levels!
  • 10 challenging bonus levels!
  • Power-ups!
  • Lasers, traps, portals!
  • High scores!
  • A BOSS!

Check http://www.overman-gaming.com for updates and more games!

Follow me at @OvermanGaming
